## Vector4.scaleAndAddToRef() method

Scale the current Vector4 values by a factor and add the result to a given Vector4

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scaleAndAddToRef(scale: number, result: Vector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scale factor |
|  result | <code>Vector4</code> | defines the Vector4 object where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

the unmodified current Vector4
